## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                     | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | The Icon size. Possible values are: `"sm"`, `"md"`, `"lg"`. Defaults to `"md"`. | `string` | `'md'`      |
| `type`   | `type`    |                                                                                 | `string` | `undefined` |
